entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
